content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --SCAT
      operator: non_empty
    - name: --CAT
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CORE-000103
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when --SCAT is not empty, but --CAT is empty.
Outcome:
  Message: --CAT should not be null when --SCAT is populated
  Output Variables:
    - --CAT
    - --SCAT
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0429
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: A further grouping or classification of the category
                  for the topic of the finding, event, or intervention. The category
                  is in --CAT.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --SCAT
                Section: Interventions
              - Cited Guidance: A further grouping or classification of the category
                  for the topic of the finding, event, or intervention. The category
                  is in --CAT.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --SCAT
                Section: Events
              - Cited Guidance: A further grouping or classification of the category
                  for the topic of the finding, event, or intervention. The category
                  is in --CAT.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --SCAT
                Section: Findings
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when --SCAT is not empty, but --CAT is empty.
